result.html: Cár tógadh thúWhere were you raised?

result.eng: He raised his glass to drink to health.

result.eng: An interesting question was raised in the meeting.
result.html: Tógadh ceist shuimiúil sa chruinniúAn interesting question was raised in the meeting.
result.ponchtml: Tógaḋ ceist ẛuimiúil sa ċruinniúAn interesting question was raised in the meeting.

result.html: Tógadh i mBéal Feirste méI was raised in Belfast.

result.eng: She was born and raised in Ros an Mhíl, but we live in Leitir Mucú now.

result.eng: I was born and raised here.
